tgt_original: 5 agotrakāṇām uttrāsasthānatvād ghorā |  6 mahāyaśā vighuṣṭakīrtiḥ |  7 maitrīmayatvād vatsalā |
mahārtho vajradharatvam,  tad eva paramaṃ phalaṃ mārgābhyāsasya,  tad vineyebhyo deśayatīti parārthasampattyā stuvanti |
11 deśanāviṣayadvāreṇaiva stuvanti- buddhetyādi |  12 buddhair vairocanādibhiḥ |  13 yeṣām iti yā siddhiḥ,  bodhisattvānāṃ cāgocaraḥ |
